resources.name: Login customer
resources.description:
Use the customer email to generate an access token for the user.

Possible response status codes:

|Status|Description|
|--------|-----------|
|`200 OK`|Successful login|
|`400 BAD REQUEST`|Missing request params (email)|
|`401 UNAUTHORIZED`|Invalid credentials|
|`500 INTERNAL SERVER ERROR`|Unexpected error|

resources.name: Get customer
resources.description:
> Requires Authentication

Retrieves a customer using it's ID. If the customer that made the request is not the owner of the ID, returns status 403 (Forbidden).

Possible response status codes:

|Status|Description|
|--------|-----------|
|`200 OK`|Success retrieving user|
|`400 BAD REQUEST`|Invalid request params (customerId)|
|`401 UNAUTHORIZED`|Invalid credentials|
|`403 FORBIDDEN`|Customer not owner of resource|
|`404 NOT FOUND`|Customer not found|
|`500 INTERNAL SERVER ERROR`|Unexpected error|

resources.name: Update customer
resources.description:
> Requires Authentication

Update customer data using it's ID. Can update name and email. If the user that made the request is not the owner of the ID, returns Http 403 (Forbidden).

Possible response status codes:

|Status|Description|
|--------|-----------|
|`200 OK`|Success updating user|
|`400 BAD REQUEST`|Invalid request body or params (name, email, customerId)|
|`401 UNAUTHORIZED`|Invalid credentials|
|`403 FORBIDDEN`|Customer not owner of resource|
|`404 NOT FOUND`|Customer not found|
|`500 INTERNAL SERVER ERROR`|Unexpected error|

resources.name: Delete customer
resources.description:
> Requires Authentication

Delete all customer data using customer ID.

Possible response status codes:

|Status|Description|
|--------|-----------|
|`204 NO CONTENT`|Success deleting customer data|
|`400 BAD REQUEST`|Invalid request params (customerId)|
|`401 UNAUTHORIZED`|Invalid credentials|
|`403 FORBIDDEN`|Customer not owner of resource|
|`404 NOT FOUND`|Customer or product not found|
|`500 INTERNAL SERVER ERROR`|Unexpected error|

resources.name: Favorite product
resources.description:
> Requires Authentication

Favorite a product using customer and product's ID. If the user that made the request is not the owner of the ID, returns Http 403 (Forbidden).

Possible response status codes:

|Status|Description|
|--------|-----------|
|`200 OK`|Success adding product to favorites|
|`400 BAD REQUEST`|Invalid request params (customerId, productId)|
|`401 UNAUTHORIZED`|Invalid credentials|
|`403 FORBIDDEN`|Customer not owner of resource|
|`404 NOT FOUND`|Customer or product not found|
|`409 CONFLICT`|Customer already favorited this product|
|`500 INTERNAL SERVER ERROR`|Unexpected error|

resources.name: Remove favorite product
resources.description:
> Requires Authentication

Remove a product from a customer favorites using customer and product IDs.

Possible response status codes:

|Status|Description|
|--------|-----------|
|`200 OK`|Success removing product from favorites|
|`400 BAD REQUEST`|Invalid request params (customerId, productId)|
|`401 UNAUTHORIZED`|Invalid credentials|
|`403 FORBIDDEN`|Customer not owner of resource|
|`404 NOT FOUND`|Customer or product not found|
|`500 INTERNAL SERVER ERROR`|Unexpected error|

resources.name: Sign up (create customer)
resources.description:
Creates a customer using name and email.

Possible response status codes:

|Status|Description|
|--------|-----------|
|`200 OK`|Successful customer registration|
|`400 BAD REQUEST`|Invalid request body (name, email, email_confirmation)|
|`409 CONFLICT`|Customer with that email already exists|
|`500 INTERNAL SERVER ERROR`|Unexpected error|
